main event: On April 7, 1966, multiple witnesses reported sighting two unidentified flying objects with red and white lights over Shreveport, Louisiana.
interesting points: The observations included a humming sound emitted by the objects., The objects were observed changing course abruptly several times., Witnesses reported that the lights flashed brightly and then faded occasionally., The sighting lasted around 15 minutes, with an abrupt disappearance of the objects., Investigating officers suggested the lights may have been reflections of carnival lights on low-lying clouds at the time.
sighted object: two unidentified flying objects with red and white lights
